it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Controller Class This class is the core of the game logic
    Author:
    Federico Lichinchi, Davide Lorenzi (JDocs)

      • rejoinPlayer

        public boolean rejoinPlayer(java.lang.String playerAddress)
        This methods remove the 'playerAddress' from the ArrayList that contains the addresses of the players that have left the match. This method is called when a player has rejoined the game. This method returns 'true' if this address is found and remove successfully from the ArrayList, 'false' otherwise.
        Parameters:
        playerAddress - Address of the player to remove from the ArrayList
        Returns:
        true if the player correctly re joined the match, false otherwise

      • addNewVirtualView

        public void addNewVirtualView(VirtualView virtualView,
                              ClientInterfaceSocket clientInterfaceSocket)
        This method, called by the server, is used to add a new VirtualView class to the virtualViews ArrayList of Controller, with socket connection. This method is used when a players rejoined the match.
        Parameters:
        virtualView - The new VirtualView object to add
        clientInterfaceSocket - The client interface RMI to add to the virtualView

                                        int num)

        num - This number assumes 1 value if player has to choose the first die, 2 otherwise.

        the die whose position will be changed
